data.oai_dc:dc: This data set contains raw genotypes of 17 microsatellite markers for 5 Scaptodrosophila aclinata populations collected in 1995. When using this data, please cite the original publication:Barker, J S F (2005). Population structure and host-plant specialization in two Scaptodrosophila flower-breeding species. Heredity 94: 129-138
